issue.title: [CI] Github Actions Windows job should run tests in parallel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8194](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8194). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the GHA Windows job runs tests using `-j 1`. But IIRC GHA exposes two CPU cores.
